ygData.subject: Re: Where to find Skewers Mold
ygData.msgSnippet: Put 20 points in to blacksmithing from the start and you don t need file molds till you want to make studs (I have found them in the wood elf town, but that is
ygData.messageBody:
Put 20 points in to blacksmithing from the start and you don't need file
molds till you want to make studs (I have found them in the wood elf town,
but that is where I am from.). You don't want to make skewers yet either,
you will waist a HUGE amount of cash for little skill gain. Instead make
scalers and then large lanterns till they each become trivial, and then jump
to skewers. I believe most of the molds can be found in freeport.

Ailenu
Rallos Zek

-----Original Message-----
From: g.koenig@... [mailto:g.koenig@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 10:24 AM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Where to find Skewers Mold


From: g.koenig@...

Hi,
Where can i find Files and Skewers Mold?
I am near Qeynos for the moment but i can move
bye
